item.title: WHY DOCKER
item.description:
I needed to install many Docker Things for a Customer, well i did… Good Actually BUT i dont want to use Docker anymore xD but i need to do some things again.

What did i actually do?

Well i needed to install Things like Authentik, Collabora, and some other things. The Problem was i was thrown in the Cold Lake without any Experience how xD

Well now i know how to do it, first just search for Tutorials AND READ THEM thats how i was doing!
item.content:
I needed to install many Docker Things for a Customer, well i did… Good Actually BUT i dont want to use Docker anymore xD but i need to do some things again.

What did i actually do?

Well i needed to install Things like Authentik, Collabora, and some other things. The Problem was i was thrown in the Cold Lake without any Experience how xD

Well now i know how to do it, first just search for Tutorials AND READ THEM thats how i was doing!

item.title: Starting my Own Blog
item.description:
Im Starting a Blog where i just post some Tech “Tutorials” (its not Really Tutorials but just the way that was i doing it) and some things about my Life (Like my Hackerspace and this Things). Im Starting with this here and here i explain how i do it (With a Tutorial-Like Thing)

How i write it?

I write it in Obsidian, Obisidian is a Markdown Editor and it has cool Features but the Main Reason i use it, is because it shows me the Hashtags with the Right Format (and a Friend told me to use so i tested it and it was good)
item.content:
Im Starting a Blog where i just post some Tech “Tutorials” (its not Really Tutorials but just the way that was i doing it) and some things about my Life (Like my Hackerspace and this Things). Im Starting with this here and here i explain how i do it (With a Tutorial-Like Thing)

How i write it?

I write it in Obsidian, Obisidian is a Markdown Editor and it has cool Features but the Main Reason i use it, is because it shows me the Hashtags with the Right Format (and a Friend told me to use so i tested it and it was good)

How i Transform it to a to a Blog?

I use a Script (from NetworkChuck) so it Transform from Markdown to a Website with Go and Python

Why?

“To have a Second Brain” and to share to the world what i am Learning
